name: Roof & Gutter Care
description: Essential maintenance for your home's primary defense against the elements.

templates.name: Clean Gutters and Downspouts
templates.description: Remove debris from gutters to prevent water damage and foundation issues.
instructions: Set up a ladder on stable ground.
Wear gloves and scoop debris out of gutters.
Flush gutters with a garden hose to check flow.
Clear downspouts of any clogs using a snake or hose pressure.
Check for loose brackets or leaks while cleaning.
safetyPrecautions: Do not work on the roof in wet or windy conditions.

templates.name: Inspect Roof Shingles
templates.description: Visual inspection of roof condition to catch leaks early.
instructions: Walk around the perimeter of your home and look up at the roof.
Use binoculars to inspect for missing, curled, or damaged shingles.
Check for moss or algae growth.
Inspect flashing around chimneys and vents for rust or separation.
Look for granules in the gutters (sign of aging shingles).
safetyPrecautions: Perform inspection from the ground if possible.

templates.name: Remove Roof Moss
templates.description: Gentle removal of moss to prevent shingle damage.
instructions: Wet the moss with water.
Gently scrub moss with a long-handled soft-bristle brush (downward motion only).
Apply a moss killer or zinc strips if moss is persistent.
Do not use a pressure washer as it can damage shingles.
safetyPrecautions: Use fall protection if working on the roof.

name: Foundation & Walls
description: Protect the structural integrity of your home.

templates.name: Inspect Foundation for Cracks
templates.description: Check for settlement cracks or water intrusion points.
instructions: Walk the perimeter of the foundation.
Look for vertical or diagonal cracks wider than 1/8 inch.
Check for crumbling concrete or water stains.
Ensure soil slopes away from the foundation.

templates.name: Clean Exterior Siding
templates.description: Wash siding to prevent mold and improve curb appeal.
instructions: Close all windows and doors.
Cover nearby plants with tarps.
Use a garden hose or low-pressure washer with siding cleaner.
Scrub stubborn spots with a soft brush.
Rinse thoroughly from top to bottom.
safetyPrecautions: Avoid high pressure on vinyl or wood siding to prevent water intrusion.

name: Windows & Doors
description: Maintain efficiency and security of entry points.

templates.name: Inspect Window Seals
templates.description: Check for drafts and failed seals to improve energy efficiency.
instructions: Check caulking around exterior window frames.
Look for fogging between glass panes (indicates failed seal).
Feel for drafts around the frame on a windy day.
Replace weatherstripping if brittle or missing.

templates.name: Lubricate Door Hinges and Tracks
templates.description: Keep doors operating smoothly and quietly.
instructions: Wipe dirt from hinges and sliding door tracks.
Apply silicone spray or white lithium grease to hinges.
Open and close the door several times to distribute lubricant.
Wipe away excess oil.
